highlights.title: Service highlights
highlights.description: Two common goals we hear: keep things consistently tidy, and make improvements that feel worth it.

items.title: Maintenance that stays consistent
bullets: Reliable regular visits so your yard doesn’t get away from you.
Clean edges, tidy beds, and seasonal refreshes when needed.
Clear communication on what we’ll do each visit.

items.title: Improvements that add real value
bullets: Smarter planting and layout for easier long-term upkeep.
Mulch, edging, and tidy finishes that make a big difference.
Practical recommendations that fit your budget and timeline.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.description: Quick answers to the most common questions we hear.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance?
items.answer: Yes. We can schedule regular visits (weekly, fortnightly, or as needed) to keep your yard consistently tidy.

items.question: Can I get a quote from photos?
items.answer: Often, yes. If the job is straightforward, photos and a quick description can be enough to provide a quote or a good estimate.

items.question: Do you remove green waste?
items.answer: Yes—green waste removal can be included. Let us know what you’d like cleared and we’ll include it in the quote.

items.question: How soon can you start?
items.answer: It depends on the season and the scope of work. Once we know what you need, we’ll confirm the next available times.

items.question: Do you provide fixed quotes?
items.answer: Yes. For most jobs we provide a clear quote outlining what’s included. If anything changes, we’ll discuss it before proceeding.

finalCta.title: Not sure what you need?
finalCta.description: Tell us a bit about your yard and we’ll recommend the best next step.
